thread.title: How Marin Cilic Can Spoil Roger Federer’s 20th Slam Plan

author: Tom Perrotta
title: How Marin Cilic Can Spoil Roger Federer’s 20th Slam Plan
text:
At the Australian Open on Sunday, the world could witness an accomplishment in men’s tennis that no one had ever thought possible: Roger Federer winning his 20th Grand Slam singles title.
The 36-year-old Federer has that chance after a victory against Hyeon Chung, the 21-year-old from South Korea who had an improbable run to the semifinals. Chung was behind 6-1 5-2 when he retired because of a blister in his left foot that all but ruined his ability to run.
...
